high_descs: turn left, walk to the white sofa, turn left walk to the blue sofa
grab the phone on the blue sofa
anns.task_desc: grab the phone from the blue sofa, turn on the lamp in the corner

high_descs: Turn to your left and go to the white couch, then turn to your left again and go to the blue arm chair, across the room.
Pick up the cell phone on the back of the arm chair's seat, behind the computer.
Turn to the lamp at your right, in the corner.
Turn on the lamp in the corner.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the living room lamp.

high_descs: move to the couch to the left of the fire place
pick up a phone from the couch
move to the left of the couch
anns.task_desc: Inspect a phone with a lamp.
